title: Which company is better for a fresher BE graduate, Yash technologies or HCL technologies? - Quora

response.answer_text: hi, HCl Technologies is a very good company if you are joining as a software Engineer. you will get lot of flexibility while working here like they won’t put pressure to come on time or go on time.. you just need to complete your work anyhow and prove your worth…you can switch project if you don’t like a project..you can switch to you favourite Technology if you don’t like you current Technology..Good number of projects in Database and Java.Friendly Environment , Hr are friendly if you are good at work and have good image in project. Senior’s will help you a lot.one thing is you may need to compromise in package in HCL, they are having huge variable pay gap.Again for fresher’s the package depends on where you are SAP developer or developer or you are tester. it’s less for a tester… unfortunately :p
